what: Early Warning Information on Landslides in Sri Lanka During the Ditwah Storm
title: Early Warning Information on Landslides in Sri Lanka During the Ditwah Storm
text: package provides curated early-warning data landslides Sri Lanka Ditwah storm, scraped Disaster Management Centre, Sri Lanka. includes structured, machine-readable, analysis-ready tidy dataset designed support statistical workflows, education, research.

title: Early Warning Information on Landslides in Sri Lanka During the Ditwah Storm
text: can install development version ditwahLandslide GitHub :

title: Early Warning Information on Landslides in Sri Lanka During the Ditwah Storm
code: library(ditwahLandslide) head(ditwah_landslides_warnings) #> # A tibble: 6 × 13 #>   ID_DataAnalyst Report_Date         Report_Time Message_ID  Valid_From_Date     #>   <chr>          <dttm>              <chr>       <chr>       <dttm>              #> 1 NGSM           2025-11-20 00:00:00 16:00       LEWM-20-11… 2025-11-20 00:00:00 #> 2 NGSM           2025-11-20 00:00:00 16:00       LEWM-20-11… 2025-11-20 00:00:00 #> 3 NGSM           2025-11-20 00:00:00 16:00       LEWM-20-11… 2025-11-20 00:00:00 #> 4 NGSM           2025-11-20 00:00:00 16:00       LEWM-20-11… 2025-11-20 00:00:00 #> 5 NGSM           2025-11-20 00:00:00 16:00       LEWM-20-11… 2025-11-20 00:00:00 #> 6 NGSM           2025-11-20 00:00:00 16:00       LEWM-20-11… 2025-11-20 00:00:00 #> # ℹ 8 more variables: Valid_From_Time <chr>, Valid_To_Date <dttm>, #> #   Valid_To_Time <chr>, District <chr>, Location <chr>, Level <dbl>, #> #   State <dbl>, Province <chr> viz_landslide_warnings_from_to(province = "", district = "Monaragala", interactivity=FALSE)

what: Landslide early warning messages during Ditwah strom in November, 2025 — ditwah_landslides_warnings
title: Landslide early warning messages during Ditwah strom in November, 2025 — ditwah_landslides_warnings
text: dataset containing early warning messages landslide-prone areas, including report details, validity periods, locations, warning levels.

title: Landslide early warning messages during Ditwah strom in November, 2025 — ditwah_landslides_warnings
Landslide early warning messages during Ditwah strom in November, 2025 — ditwah_landslides_warnings
text: data frame following variables: ID_DataAnalyst chr. Identifier data analyst Report_Date dttm. Date landslide early warning report issued. Report_Time chr. Time report issued, HH:MM format. Message_ID chr. Unique identifier warning message. Encodes warning type, date, time, message sequence. Valid_From_Date dttm. Start date warning valid. Valid_From_Time chr. Start time warning valid, HH:MM format. Valid_To_Date dttm. End date warning remains valid. Valid_To_Time chr. End time warning remains valid, HH:MM format. District chr. Administrative district potential landslide risk identified. Location chr. Specific locality, town, area within district affected warning. Level dbl. Landslide early warning level (1 = Level 1, 2 = Level 2, 3 = Level 3). Represents severity situation. State dbl. Direction magnitude landslide (1-shifted one level , 2-shifted two levels , -1-shifted one level , -2-shifted two levels ). Province Province

title: Landslide early warning messages during Ditwah strom in November, 2025 — ditwah_landslides_warnings
text: Based land slides early warning pdf reports published Disaster Management Centre, Sri Lanka. data PDF files cleaned processes package authors.

what: Launch the Landslides Warnings Shiny Application — run_app
title: Launch the Landslides Warnings Shiny Application — run_app
text: function launches Shiny application included ditwahLandslide package. app must located inst/app/ within package source. installed, directory available via system.file().

title: Launch the Landslides Warnings Shiny Application — run_app
